document.title: Add Google Analytics to Nextjs 13
document.description: Google Analytics is a great tool for tracking page views and other website metrics

body.raw:
> ## Introduction It's true, Google Analytics is a great tool for tracking page views and other website metrics. But when I saw that my PageSpeed rating was suffering because of it, I was at a loss. I scoured the internet looking for a simple, yet effective way to lazy-load Google Analytics, but all I found were overly complicated solutions that had me scratching my head. After wrestling with the problem for what felt like an eternity, I finally figured out the perfect way to lazy-load Google Analytics.
> ## First, what is Lazy-loading? Lazy-loading is a way of making your website faster by only loading certain pieces of content when they are needed. It’s a great way to reduce the amount of time your site takes to load, and can be especially useful when it comes to loading Google Analytics. By lazy-loading Google Analytics, you can ensure that your tracking code is only loaded when a visitor interacts with your website. This can help you improve your website’s performance, and make your visitors’ experience that much smoother.
> ## How It Works The way we will lazy-load Google Analytics is by waiting for the user to scroll down the page before loading the Google Analytics tracking code. This means that visitors who simply load the page and don’t scroll won’t trigger the Google Analytics tracking code. You’ll need to decide whether or not you’re okay with this trade-off for the performance boost. For my use case, I wasn’t too concerned about tracking those visitors who simply loaded the page and immediately bounced. I only wanted to get data from those who were truly interacting with my website, so this trade-off worked for me.

document.title: Fihome
document.description: The platform provides real estate information, applying artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning to real estate appraisal, price proposals and real estate value statistics.

body.raw:
> ## What i did? This is my first project which i had been join like a Front-End Developer. Building human interfaces and sharpening my thinking skills have both been made significantly easier for me by this endeavor. document.title: Onmic
document.description: A voice-streaming platform towards barrier-free expression and authentic connection through voice

body.raw:
> ## Short Explanation

As the first audio application developed by Vietnamese people, OnMic provides the ability to create live chat rooms (voice-streaming), with interaction between speakers and listeners. Instead of using text, photos, or videos as a means of communication, OnMic allows people to "gather" in audio chat rooms to listen and talk about a variety of topics. Here, users can build relationships with friends and colleagues quickly with just a smartphone without spending any money.

> ## Tech Stack Used

<TechStack
  className='text-3xl'
  data={['nextjs', 'redux', 'agora', 'mantine', 'tailwind', 'apollo']}
/>

- Agora: Buid live stream real-time audio sytem.
- Redux: Manage global state
- Mantine + TailwindCSS: build components faster and easy to customize
- Apollo: fetch data from api (Graphql) and handle response with cache

> ## Features

/>

<hr />

> ## Lessons Learned

This is the first project that i had worked in a product company. I experienced the process of making a technology product, then maintaining and fixing bugs.

We are keep track of everything in Trello and assign the task on that app. It is
really fun working with a lot of people and try bunch of new ideas and communicate
our differences. I also learned a lot about developing a website with a bunch of
floating illustrations and absolutely-positioned elements. I usually avoid making
designs with illustrations that are absolutely-positioned

document.title: Prime
document.description: Online dating and geosocial networking application

body.raw:
> ## Short Explanation

Prime Partner is an online dating and geosocial networking application. In Prime, users can like or dislike other users' profiles, which include their photos, a short bio, and a list of their interests.

<TechStack
  className='text-3xl'
  data={['vite', 'reactjs', 'zustant', 'reactQuery']}
/>

- Zustant: manage global states and handle authenticate user
- Vite: build and config source code
- Mantine: lib ui for build components faster and practice with it
- React Query + Axios: fetch data from api and handle response with cache

> ## Features

Prime has changed the way people date, create meaningful relationships & network with women making the first move. Meet new people.

- Find someone of the opposite sex: you can find and search some with the opposite sex with you. Every feature in search which for free, so users can search for anyone they want

<SplitImage>
  <ClImage
    publicId='v1693145054/Group_48095791_rz7t57.png'
    width={400}
    height={400}
  />
  <ClImage
    publicId='v1693144055/Screenshot_2023-08-27_at_15.11.06_rfefmj.png'
    width={400}
    height={400}
  />
</SplitImage>

- Match & Chat: when you find someone you like or want to get to know, you can send them a free message to get to know them or you can like them. If the other like you too, bold of you will receive notification and text each other without limits

<SplitImage>
  <ClImage
    publicId='v1693560430/Screenshot_2023-09-01_at_16.26.08_tyy5ns.png'
    width={400}
    height={400}
  />
  <ClImage
    publicId='v1693560426/Screenshot_2023-09-01_at_16.26.31_c3gohb.png'
    width={400}
    height={400}
  />
</SplitImage>

- Create your own community: you can create your own community with public or prive privacy. Owner of the community can be setting or delete every post which posted in new feed. Member can create post in new feed of their community.

<ClImage
  publicId='v1693560618/Screenshot_2023-09-01_at_16.28.52_hslyam.png'
  width={350}
  height={300}
  mdx={true}
  className='mx-auto'
/>

<hr />

> ## Lessons Learned

I had the opportunity to work with Japanese people and learn about their culture.

Another important lesson learned that i learned zustand technology and applied it
to real projects to manage global state instead of using redux as usual.

document.title: Side Projects
document.description: Simple projects that I built to learn or excerise my skill everyday.

body.raw:
## Chatify
### Description Personal Chat Room or Workspace to share resources and hangout with friends. Live demo • Github
## Pick Movie
### Description Millions of movies and people to discover. Explore now. Live demo • Github
## Music Player
### Description Millions of movies and people to discover. Explore now. Live demo • Github
## Youtube
### Description I used RapidAPI for fetch data from youtube and showing this to front-end Live demo • Github
